casebody.data:
R. F. STIFFLEMIRE v. D. F. SOUTHARD, J. B. SOUTHARD, and B. M. SOUTHARD, co-partners doing business under the style and firm name of Southard Lumber Company. 14 So. (2nd) 903

June Term, 1943

September 17, 1943 Division A Rehearing Denied October 19, 1943 James N. Daniel, for appellant. A. G. Campbell, Jr., for appellees. PER CURIAM:

The record and the briefs in this cause have been examined and we find no reversible error nor would an opinion serve any useful purpose.

*479Affirmed..

BUFORD, C. J., TERRELL, CHAPMAN and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
